channel.title: Little Help Needed!
channel.description: How Do I Change The Starter Equipment (Equiped) And Add+Delete Items From The ::Starter?

item.title: Little Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @steveolicious steveolicious
item.description:
@steveolicious wrote:

For the add/delete items for the ::starter command:
Open up client.java
Search for:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter"))

or just starter, and then you will see this:

addItem(995, 25000000); addItem(392, 15000); addItem(6528, 1); addItem(554, 20000); addItem(555, 20000); addItem(565, 20000); addItem(556, 20000); addItem(557, 20000);
the numbers like 565, 556, are the item ID;s, the 15000, 1, and 20000 are the item amount.
Modify as you wish.

Read full topic

item.title: Little Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Player.java, And for the starter look for “starter” with quotations, in client.java, theres going to be like

addItem(995,#####)

Modify it. 995 is the ID for gp, #### is the quantity.

Read full topic
